author: A_Brickset_user
title: cool set
review: I have this set and think it is really cool expecially the keyring, the clip is good as you can put it where ever you want. The braclet is also nice I like the fact that you can have the long clikit peices horizontally and vertically. the only bad parts I think are that you only get two different colour bits so it is a bit boring, but other wise its good!!!!!!!!!!
